titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate on the importance of strengthening bilateral relations in general, and investment relations specifically, between the United States and Brazil.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 3/12/2009--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) the U.S. and Brazilian governments should continue to develop their partnership; and (2) the Secretary of the Treasury should pursue negotiations with Brazilian officials for a bilateral tax treaty that is consistent with existing U.S. tax treaty practices and reflects internationally recognized tax policy principles.
